item.title: Brandeis Career: Brandeis Alumni's Career Path Database
item.description: Why Brandeis Career While I was working as an office assistant at Brandeis University, I was assigned to collect, clean, and visualize all CS alumni’s data, including their majors and their job history (companies and the corresponding employment duration). We spent six months just on collecting all the data and put it into a large Google Sheet file, and then we spent an entire semester on cleaning it. We had a large team and without a clear documentation, different people had different habit of recording the data.
